snippet.title: Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew - Developer Insight Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1545560 

Take a peek behind the development of Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew and get a first look at the playable character Toya, the assassin and ship cook of the cursed crew. 

---
Welcome to the Lost Caribbean! In this stealth strategy game, join a ghost ship with a living soul and assemble a cursed pirate crew. Embrace magical powers to defy the menacing army of the Inquisition, who stands between you and the mysterious treasure of the legendary Captain Mordechai. Coming in 2023! #shadowgambit

Releasing on Steam, Epic Games Store, Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5.

Find out more: https://www.shadowgambit.com
---
Chapters
00:00 What is Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew
00:31 The Vision
01:02 Enhancing Player Freedom
01:53 Embracing Magic
02:24 Introducing New Character: Toya - The Assassin Cook
03:04 Wishlist Now!
---
Credits
Concept: Mimimi Games
Video Recording & Trailer Editing: Simon Troll
